summary: Enable Magento APM profiler bootstrap automatically during deploys and migrate existing environments to MAGE_PROFILER-based activation

changes.description: Set MAGE_PROFILER for existing environment php services (php-fpm/php-fpm-admin/cron) so request-level APM tracing is active without manual SSH commands. Requires Magento images that include mage-zero/magento2-opensearch-observability >= 1.0.3.
